verses.verse: For all this I <S%H5414>laid<s%> to my <S%H3820>heart,<s%> even to <S%H952>explore<s%> all <S%H6662>this:<s%> that the righteous, and the <S%H2450>wise,<s%> and their <S%H5652>works,<s%> are in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H430>God;<s%> whether it is <S%H160>love<s%> <S%H1571>or<s%> <S%H8135>hatred,<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H3045>doesn't<s%> know <S%H6440>it;<s%> all is before them.

All things come alike to <S%H259>all.<s%> There is one <S%H4745>event<s%> to the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> and to the <S%H7563>wicked;<s%> to the <S%H2896>good,<s%> to the <S%H2889>clean,<s%> to the <S%H2931>unclean,<s%> to him who <S%H2076>sacrifices,<s%> and to him who <S%H834>doesn't<s%> <S%H2076>sacrifice.<s%> As is the <S%H2896>good,<s%> so is the <S%H2398>sinner;<s%> he who <S%H7650>takes<s%> an <S%H3373>oath,<s%> as he who fears an <S%H7621>oath.<s%>

This is an <S%H7451>evil<s%> in all that is <S%H6213>done<s%> under the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> that there is <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4745>event<s%> to <S%H3820>all:<s%> yes also, the heart of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and <S%H1947>madness<s%> is in their <S%H3824>heart<s%> while they <S%H2416>live,<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> that they go to the <S%H4191>dead.<s%>

<S%H4310>For<s%> to him who <S%H3426>is<s%> <S%H2266>joined<s%> with all the <S%H2416>living<s%> there is <S%H986>hope;<s%> for a <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H3611>dog<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than a <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H738>lion.<s%>

For the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> that they will <S%H4191>die,<s%> but the <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H3045>don't<s%> know <S%H3972>anything,<s%> neither do they have any more a <S%H7939>reward;<s%> for their <S%H2143>memory<s%> is <S%H7911>forgotten.<s%>

Also their <S%H160>love,<s%> their <S%H8135>hatred,<s%> and their <S%H7068>envy<s%> has <S%H6>perished<s%> long <S%H3528>ago;<s%> neither have they any more a <S%H2506>portion<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> in anything that is <S%H6213>done<s%> under the <S%H8121>sun.<s%>

Go your <S%H3212>way<s%> â€” <S%H398>eat<s%> your <S%H3899>bread<s%> with <S%H8057>joy,<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> your <S%H3196>wine<s%> with a <S%H2896>merry<s%> <S%H3820>heart;<s%> for <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H3528>already<s%> <S%H7521>accepted<s%> your <S%H4639>works.<s%>
Let your <S%H899>garments<s%> be <S%H6256>always<s%> <S%H3836>white,<s%> and <S%H7218>don't<s%> let your head <S%H2637>lack<s%> <S%H8081>oil.<s%>

<S%H2416>Live<s%> <S%H7200>joyfully<s%> with the <S%H802>wife<s%> whom you <S%H157>love<s%> all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H2416>life<s%> of <S%H1892>vanity,<s%> which he has <S%H5414>given<s%> you under the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> all your <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H1892>vanity:<s%> for that is your <S%H2506>portion<s%> in <S%H2416>life,<s%> and in your <S%H5999>labor<s%> in which you <S%H6001>labor<s%> under the <S%H8121>sun.<s%>

Whatever your <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H4672>finds<s%> to <S%H6213>do,<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> it with your <S%H3581>might;<s%> for there is no <S%H4639>work,<s%> nor <S%H2808>device,<s%> nor <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> nor <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> in <S%H7585>Sheol,<s%> where you are <S%H1980>going.<s%>

I <S%H7725>returned,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> under the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> that the <S%H4793>race<s%> is not to the <S%H7031>swift,<s%> nor the <S%H4421>battle<s%> to the <S%H1368>strong,<s%> neither yet <S%H3899>bread<s%> to the <S%H2450>wise,<s%> nor yet <S%H6239>riches<s%> to men of <S%H995>understanding,<s%> nor yet <S%H2580>favor<s%> to men of <S%H3045>skill;<s%> but <S%H6256>time<s%> and <S%H6294>chance<s%> happen to them <S%H7136>all.<s%>

For <S%H120>man<s%> also <S%H3045>doesn't<s%> know his <S%H6256>time.<s%> As the <S%H1709>fish<s%> that are <S%H270>taken<s%> in an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H4685>net,<s%> and as the <S%H6833>birds<s%> that are <S%H270>caught<s%> in the <S%H6341>snare,<s%> even <S%H1992>so<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> <S%H3369>snared<s%> in an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H6256>time,<s%> when it <S%H5307>falls<s%> suddenly on <S%H6597>them.<s%>
I have also <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> under the <S%H8121>sun<s%> in <S%H2090>this<s%> <S%H1419>way,<s%> and it seemed great to me.

There was a <S%H6996>little<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H4592>few<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> within <S%H1419>it;<s%> and a great <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> against <S%H5437>it,<s%> besieged <S%H1129>it,<s%> and built <S%H1419>great<s%> bulwarks against <S%H4685>it.<s%>

Now a <S%H4542>poor<s%> <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> was <S%H4672>found<s%> in <S%H2450>it,<s%> and he by his wisdom <S%H4422>delivered<s%> the <S%H5892>city;<s%> yet no <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H2142>remembered<s%> that same <S%H4542>poor<s%> <S%H120>man.<s%>

Then I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2451>"Wisdom<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than <S%H1369>strength.<s%>" Nevertheless the poor <S%H4542>man<s%>'s <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> is <S%H959>despised,<s%> and his <S%H1697>words<s%> are not <S%H8085>heard.<s%>
The <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> in <S%H5183>quiet<s%> are better than the <S%H2201>cry<s%> of him who <S%H4910>rules<s%> among <S%H3684>fools.<s%>
